metadata.synopsis: AOM/OOM dialog with the prisoners in Cazador's Palace. Astarion meets Sebastian - a young man he seduced and brought to Cazador - for the first time in 170 years. Astarion was sure Sebastian was dead, but Cazador secretly turned him into a vampire spawn. If you aggrevate Sebastian, he'll be so full of hate and pain that he'll curse you.
metadata.how_to_trigger: For AOMOrigin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As AvatarAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - CellsFor COMOrigin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As Companionselect your starting characteroe debugbookDowngrade to companionAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Cells

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *Approaching the cells, you're met by hollow faces and eyes reluctant to meet your gaze. There's an almost physical stink of decay and neglect.*

100.speaker: Sebastian
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner at the back of the cell, in the shadows

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *The last time you heard this voice, it was singing drunkenly, whispering sweetly, then sighing with pleasure.*

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *One of your conquests, claimed for Cazador. He should have been consumed long ago.*

84.speaker: Sebastian
84.text: It's your fault. You stole my life - stole my death.

46.speaker: Sebastian
46.text: You smiled and joked and got me drunk.

19.speaker: Sebastian
19.text: You called me so many sweet things. My name sounded like a lyric on your tongue.

87.speaker: Sebastian
87.text: I want to hear you say it again. Say my name.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: vampire spawn steps from the shadows at the rear of the cell into the light - he's emaciated, filthy, and dressed in rags that were once finery

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *He looks at you expectantly, his hollow eyes boring into yours.*

73.speaker: Sebastian
73.text: You still make it sound so beautiful.

21.speaker: Sebastian
21.text: You were my first. And my last.

36.speaker: Astarion
36.text: The scar on your face - it must bind you to Cazador's Black Mass. I need to kill him.

47.speaker: Astarion
47.text: I'm here to stop the Black Mass - to kill Cazador.

53.speaker: Astarion
53.text: You should be dead. Why didn't Cazador feed on you?

10.speaker: Sebastian
10.text: He made me a spawn. Left me here to rot.

69.speaker: Sebastian
69.text: But I can't rot - I can't die.

61.speaker: Sebastian
61.text: You brought me to this hell. Abandoned me.

17.speaker: Astarion
17.text: One hundred and seventy years. You were one of my first too.

97.speaker: Sebastian
97.text: My family - my friends - they're gone...
97.context: NodeContext: cracked voice, his mind is slipping

41.speaker: Sebastian
41.text: You took them from me. You took everything from me!

110.speaker: Astarion
110.text: I can fix this. When I kill Cazador, you'll be free.

1.speaker: Sebastian
1.text: Kill that monster? You can't. It's impossible.

113.speaker: Sebastian
113.text: His staff controls everything... If you can get it, maybe you can free us...

42.speaker: Sebastian
42.text: His staff controls everything... If you can get it, maybe you can free us...

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Tell me where he is, and I swear I'll end him.

99.speaker: Astarion
99.text: When he's dead, you'll be mine to command.

76.speaker: Sebastian
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner launches himself forward, smashing against the bars, reaching for Astarion, who steps back just in time. NodeContext: Shout of rage

20.speaker: Sebastian
20.text: You did this to me! You did this to us all! You cursed us to this hell.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sebastian pointing at the player (Astarion) through the bars

71.speaker: Sebastian
71.text: I damn you, Astarion! I damn you to the same misery you brought on us!
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sebastian pointing at the player (Astarion) through the barsNodeContext: Mix of rage and sobbing tears - Sebastian is broken

29.speaker: Sebastian
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Broken, cryingNodeContext: sobbing tears - Sebastian is broken

55.speaker: Sebastian
55.text: Free? I'll never be free! I'll never be whole!

59.speaker: Astarion
59.text: I truly wanted you - Cazador forced me to harm you. I'll kill him.

105.speaker: Astarion
105.text: Well, at least you only had the best.

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: There were so many of you - I can't remember them all.

108.speaker: Sebastian
108.text: You don't - you don't even remember...

25.speaker: Sebastian
25.text: He called me darling, desire, delicious... but nothing sounded so sweet as the way he said Sebastian.

39.speaker: Sebastian
39.text: What are you doing? Stop - get out of my head!

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *You remember the taste of his lips, the heat of his body...*

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *Among the scars on his face is one you recognise - it's identical to one of the runes carved into your back.*

15.speaker: Astarion
15.text: That scar on your face - it must bind you to Cazador's Black Mass.

111.speaker: Sebastian
111.text: No more games. Say my name!

98.speaker: Astarion
98.text: That scar on your face - what does it mean?

57.speaker: Astarion
57.text: You're mistaken. I have no idea who you are.

23.speaker: Sebastian
23.text: You whispered my name, over and over. It sounded like a lyric on your tongue.

104.speaker: Astarion
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks toward the cells, looking at the prisoners through the barsNodeContext: Rhetorical question - not necessarily expecting an answer.

89.speaker: Astarion
89.text: I... I recognise that voice. You were in the Blushing Mermaid.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps closer to the cell

85.speaker: Narrator
85.text: *Among the scars on his face is one is recognisable - identical to one of the runes carved into Astarion's back.*

83.speaker: Astarion
83.text: That scar - Cazador did that to you? He bound you to the Black Mass?

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: That scar - Cazador did that to you? What does it mean?

5.speaker: Astarion
5.text: I can put this right, I swear. I'm here to stop the Black Mass - to kill Cazador.

65.speaker: Astarion
65.text: Tell me where he is, and I swear I'll end him.

82.speaker: Astarion
82.text: I can put this right, I swear. I can kill Cazador and free us all.
